links.title: Could Apple Be a Millionaire-Maker Stock? -- The Motley Fool
links.description: When a company dominates as thoroughly as ( Apple NASDAQ:AAPL) has, investors look for reasons to believe that something has changed. In many cases, the perceived negatives are short term, something that does not really change the company's trajectory or business model. Daniel B. Kline owns shares of Apple.

links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

links.title: Market Maker Moves Week Ending 11/30/2018
links.description: The expected move that a stock makes is very important to know. The easiest way to get an idea of the move is to price a straddle at the close of trading on Friday. That is buying one call and one put at an ATM strike.

links.title: Stock Market Barely Avoids Oversold Conditions
links.description: AT40 = 27.6% of stocks are trading above their respective 40-day moving averages (DMAs) AT200 = 25.6% of stocks are trading above their respective 200DMAs (just above a 32-month low) VIX = 21.5 Short-term Trading Call: neutral Commentary Last week on November 20th, AT40 (T2108), the percentage of stocks trading above their respective 40-day moving averages (DMAs), dropped close to oversold conditions.
